Title: Gisoku no Moses
Description: ['When a ghost girl with no legs spots a pair of disembodied tap shoes dancing to ', Moses Supposes, ' from ', Singin' in the Rain, ', she joins in, gleefully providing a body to accompany their fancy footwork. ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: AniDB)']
